import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const GroundSettings = ( {userInitPos} ) => { const [initPosOne, setInitPosingOne] = useState('A') const [initPosTwo, setInitPosingTwo] = useState('A') const [initPosThree, setInitPosingThree] = useState('A') useEffect(() => { // console.log("initPosOne: ", initPosOne) // console.log("initPosOne: ", initPosTwo) // console.log("initPosTwo: ", initPosThree) userInitPos({initPosOne, initPosTwo, initPosThree}) }, [initPosOne, initPosTwo, initPosThree]) //eslint-disable-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps return (
) } export default GroundSettings
